column3: Olha, eu acho que eles percebessem de maneira positiva assim, porque é para mim uma coisa que ajudou é que essa situação de ter que trazer essa coisa de atualizar automaticamente o artefato era uma coisa que eu estava muito resistente.
column4: Look, I think they saw it in a positive light, because for me, one thing that helped was that I was very resistant to the idea of having to automatically update the device.

column3: Até porque assim, talvez modelando o canva e trazendo ele para o pessoal da empresa, eventualmente consiga convencer que é importante trazer um oncologista para dentro do projeto de melhoria do chatbot.
column4: Especially because, by modeling the canvas and presenting it to the company staff, you may eventually convince them that it is important to bring an oncologist into the chatbot improvement project.

column3: Não, [a reação dos meus colegas] não iria interferir na minha vontade de usar [o Canva].
column4: No, [my colleagues' reaction] would not interfere with my desire to use [Canva].

column3: It's always extra work and no one is excited about extra work, but I think asking the questions you were asking has value, yes. So not electively, but as part of a process that someone makes them go through, yeah.
